thread.title: Y&R Day Ahead Recap: Cane gushes about new assignment with sexy consultant
thread.title_full: Y&R Day Ahead Recap: Cane gushes about new assignment with sexy consultant

title: Y&R Day Ahead Recap: Cane gushes about new assignment with sexy consultant
text:
Y&R Day Ahead Recap: Cane gushes about new assignment with sexy consultant 
Candace Young Monday, February 27th, 2017 
Tuesday February 28, 2017: Colin has flashbacks, Jill is forced to refuse her sister’s request, and Victor shares his plans with Nikki. Pin 
Billy arrives to visit Jill at the Chancellor mansion. She’s still upset about him throwing Colin out and giving his things away. They bicker. Billy realizes the conversation is getting heated and apologizes. They embrace and Billy warns her to keep Colin at bay. 
Just in: Y&R alum Steve Burton’s video report on Scott Reeves’ hospitalization for heart condition 
At home, Lily asks Colin if he plans to look for a place to live; she’s counting the minutes until he moves on. Colin can’t blame her, but explains he can’t even afford to buy back his clothes that Billy donated. Lily feels bad and hands him some cash. Colin is apologetic about his behavior. Lily says Jill almost paid the ultimate price for it. Colin expresses his remorse – he loves Jill. Lily believes it, which makes the situation more tragic. 
Related: Y&R casts singing character, Tessa Porter 
In the thrift shop, Colin finds his gray suit jacket and flashes to Jill gushing over how handsome he looked in it. Next, he locates his watch and recalls Jill gifting it to him on their anniversary. Last, he spots the old music box Katherine gave Jill. He purchases all the items. 
At Brash & Sassy, Cane assumes Victoria called him in early because he took over at GC Buzz, but she actually wants to compliment him. Vikki adds that she values his contributions and would like to prove it. She makes Cane the point man for the Asian rollout and introduces him to the contact, Juliet Helton (Laur Allen) . The pair gets right to work. After, Billy arrives and updates Victoria on Jill. She, in turn, fills him in on her improved situation with Reed. They discuss Cane’s new assignment; Victoria thinks he’ll do a good job. Later, Lily arrives. She assures Billy she’s not on Colin’s side and complains about sharing space with him, and having to buy his stuff back. Billy offers to repay her, and then shares the news of Cane’s new position. Victoria and Cane join them, and Lily meets Juliet. Cane gushes that the meeting couldn’t have gone better. Lily’s thrilled for him. In the office, Billy compliments Vikki on how she ‘handled’ Mr. Fragile Ego. 
More: NASCAR’s Kurt Busch on Live with Kelly 
In the Club, Michael advises Lauren that they shouldn’t tell Fen about Scott until they know more. Lauren agonizes, waiting for her phone to ring. Michael assures her they’ll get him home…somehow. Talk turns to raising the ransom money. Lauren feels Jill is angry with her, and Michael breaks the news of her heart attack. They decide to visit, and ask her for help if she seems up to it. 
Esther welcomes Lauren and Michael into the mansion, where Lauren embraces her sister. Jill assures them she will be okay, but it dawns at her they look awful. Michael and Lauren reveal Scott’s being held for ransom in the Middle East. Lauren asks Jill to lend them the money, but Jill is so sorry – she can’t! Jill tells them Colin stole her money and becomes upset. They assure her they’ll find another way. On the way out, Lauren gets a call from the captors. Inside, Jill remarks to Esther how much Colin has cost them. Esther lectures about Jill’s health and invokes the memory of Katherine to make her point. “You wouldn’t be able to ignore her.” Jill eats and asks Kay’s portrait, “Are you happy now?” 
New: Deconstructing Y&R! Jack and Gloria are a hoot 
At the ranch, Nikki tries to discuss the Better Days Foundation with Victor, who is engrossed in the book written about him years ago, Ruthless. She rants about how awful it is, but Victor isn’t afraid of his past and reveals he’d like to write the story of his life. Nikki questions if he’s prepared to write the bad with the good. He is. Michael and Lauren arrive. While Nikki gets Victor, Michael tells his wife Victor is their best shot at getting Scott back – he loves to fight for a cause. Victor appears. Lauren asks for his help and explains the situation. Victor has questions. Lauren breaks down – she needs to know if he’ll help. Victor says it’s a complicated situation and they must follow his instructions. “Let’s get to work.” 
Back at Cane and Lily’s house, Colin finds a secret compartment in Katherine’s music box containing a key to a lockbox at City Trust and Savings. 
Cane asks Victoria if giving him this assignment was her clever way of getting him out of her hair. 
At City Trust and Savings, Colin opens a ring box and gapes at the huge ring inside. 
As Michael, Nikki, and Victor look on, Lauren tells the captors she needs to know if her son is alive. “You send me a picture of him now.”
